reviews.review_msg: Good class, interesting, but the T.A. marked the mid-term! Most of the class did below what is normally expected. The prof must take the blame for letting the T.A. have so much say in students grades. Unless you're an A student this class will lower your GPA! Most principles learned are half-assed & disproven as is the case with most psy. theories!
GREAT teacher - ultra-organized, super prepared, very clear.
